item.description:
Sliding scale: $0 to $20 if you'd like to help offset my costs. Absolutely no payment is required.

We will be "planting" mushroom spawn (Oysters and Shiitake) into logs. If you'd like, for each two logs you complete, you can take one home to enjoy yourself.

What you should probably bring: water, gloves, comfortable clothing outdoor work.
Children that can use a hammer can help out too.
Come for one session or multiple! You're welcome to stop by just to watch too!

If possible, let me know you're coming so I can plan materials accordingly.


Thank you for sharing this with interested friends!
item.name: Free Mushroom Growing Workshop
